page.title: 01THE HEYFORDS, NORTHANTS
page.content:
Nether Heyford (sometimes called Lower Heyford) is in Northamptonshire; its co-ordinates are 52'13N and 1'01W. Nether Heyford is recorded in the Domesday Book as {HEIFORD(E)} or {HAIFORD(E)}. There are about 1700 people living in the village. It has one of the largest {registered Village Greens} in the country; it is just under 5 acres. On the north side of the Green there is a road that runs right through the village, from Bugbrooke to Weedon. Middle Street leads off this road, going north to Upper Heyford, 1 mile away. Upper Heyford is recorded in the Domesday Book as {THE OTHER HAIFORD}. There are about 160 people living in Upper Heyford.
N.B. There is also a Lower and an Upper Heyford in {Oxfordshire).
